alert.note: Alert for East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cameron, southern Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow boundary moving away from storms along a line extending from Lebleu Settlement to 6 miles north of Hayes to near Welsh. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Jennings, Welsh, Iowa, Lake Arthur, Hayes, Lebleu Settlement, Thornwell, Lowry, Holmwood, Bell City, Roanoke, and Lacassine. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 35 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Cameron; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis; Upper Vermilion
